overview: Earned his degree in Modern Languages in 2000, with a specialization in Media and Communication, at LUMSA University in Rome, where he served as a Member of the Studentsâ€™ Representative Council and Member of the Academic Senate. He began his career in the advertising field working as an Account Supervisor at Studio PiÃ¹ S.p.a., an advertising agency operating in Rome and Milan. In 2003 he joined ADVance as a Web Marketing Manager and contributed to the launch of the Gomeo and Betterdeals Networks. In 2004 he was hired by GoAdv, a spin-off company of ADVance, where he worked closely with the CEO and was one of the key players in the development and continued enhancement of the business. In January 2007 he moved to Dublin to start up GoAdvertising Ltd and served as a Managing Director for the Irish Company. Back to Rome, he was appointed COO and has been in charge of the Group business operations for 2 years. In August 2010 he left GoAdv to start up YOUniversal Media, a digital marketing agency devoted to provide search marketing services and monetization solutions to professional publishers and media companies.
